00007 #include <iostream>
00008 #include <fstream>
00009 #include <string.h>
00010 
00011 using namespace std;
00012 main(){
00013   stream in;
00014   char filename[20];
00015   cout << "Enter the file name to read from: ";
00016   cin >> filename;
00017   in.open(filename);
00018   if (!in) {
00019     cout << "Input file cannot be opened.\n";
00020     return(1);
00021   }
00022   char str[80];
00023   while (!in.eof()) {
00024     in >> str;
00025     cout << str << " ";
00026     strcpy(str, "");
00027   }
00028   cout << " Ende\n";
00029   in.close();
00030   return (0);
00031 }
